text:
1.パンドラは
　沢山のものを
　食べるのが
　好きです、
　虫は除く
style: font-size: 14px;left: 4%;top: 37%;width: 124px;height: 80px;text-align: left;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: left;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
2.ヒトミが
　デザインした
style: font-size: 14px;left: 4%;top: 46%;width: 135px;height: 34px;text-align: left;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: left;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
3.とても
　気怠い
　日曜の午後
style: font-size: 14px;left: 4%;top: 51%;width: 94px;height: 50px;text-align: left;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: left;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
4.カズが以前
　着ていた服
style: font-size: 14px;left: 4%;top: 57%;width: 171px;height: 40px;text-align: left;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: left;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;
